Privacy Policy

Last updated: December 2024

What Data We Collect

When you join Job Club, we collect the following information:

  • Name and email address
  • Major and graduation year
  • Professional URLs (LinkedIn, GitHub, Portfolio, Calendly) - if provided
  • Career goals and mentorship interest

How We Use Your Data

We use your information to:

  • Send you a personalized onboarding checklist based on your profile
  • Track your progress in our member management system
  • Post your introduction to our Discord community (with your name and career goal)
  • Send relevant event notifications and resources
  • Match you with mentors (if you expressed interest)

Third-Party Services

We use the following services to operate Job Club:

  • Sanity CMS: Stores member profiles, events, and content
  • HubSpot/Airtable: Manages member data and communications
  • Zapier/Make: Automates onboarding workflows and notifications
  • Discord: Community platform for member interaction
  • Plausible/Google Analytics: Website analytics (only with your consent)

Cookies

We use cookies only with your explicit consent. Our analytics tool tracks page views and basic events to help us improve the site. You can accept or reject cookies using the banner that appears when you first visit our site.

If you reject cookies, we will not track your activity, and only essential cookies (if any) will be used.

Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access your personal data we have stored
  • Correct any inaccurate information
  • Delete your data from our systems
  • Withdraw consent for analytics cookies at any time
  • Export your data in a portable format

Data Retention

We retain your data for as long as you are an active member of Job Club. If you request deletion, we will remove your data within 30 days.

Data Security

We take reasonable measures to protect your data, including using secure connections (HTTPS) and limiting access to authorized personnel only.

Data Deletion Requests

To request deletion of your data, please email jobclub@njit.edu with "Data Deletion Request" in the subject line.

Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or a notice on our website.

Contact Us

For privacy questions or concerns, contact us at jobclub@njit.edu.
